item.title: Unity2D中摄像头视角屏幕上的点坐标获取
item.description: 按照教程里的一步一步做了,先申请到两个三维向量但是赋值为 void CalculateSize() { Vector3 leftDown = new Vector3(0, 0); Vector3 rightUp = new Vector3(1, 1); Vector3 p1 = Camera.main.ViewportToWorldPoint(leftDown); Vector3 p2 = Camera.main.ViewportToWorldPoint(rightUp); ...... } 可是即便转化成了世界坐标,他的坐标
